attributes.action: Make it complusory all Dog Walker/Pet Sitters are Insured
attributes.additional_details:
As responsible dog walker & Pet sitter, we feel there need to be some sort of enforcement to make sure all dog walker and pet sitter have insurance.
Too many dog walker are operating without insurance and walking far too many dog at one time to be able to ensure they are in full control.
Please sign our petition to weed out the  non responsible dog walkers and pets sitter in Scotland
